ðŸ“– Summary: Inbox Zero is an open-source AI email assistant and client designed to help users efficiently manage their inbox. It offers features like AI-powered email management, reply tracking, smart categorization, bulk unsubscribing, cold email blocking, and email analytics, all aimed at reducing time spent on email and achieving inbox zero.
